channel.title: INfinance

item.title: Home sellers get a reality check even as sales pace inches up
item.description: The housing market improved slightly in July, as sales of existing homes rose.

item.title: Here’s how much you’d pay to get Social Security’s inflation protection on your own
item.description: Social Security beats anything insurance companies offer.

item.title: The good news is we got an $800K windfall. The bad news is it came after a layoff. What do we do with it?

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
